sentences.sContent: Where supreme adaptability is required , out-of- control swarmware is what you want .
sentences.sContent_eng: Where supreme adaptability is required , out-of- control swarmware is what you want .
sentences.sCn: 在需要终极适应性的地方，你所需要的是不受控制的群。

sentences.sContent: We will emphasize the membrane absorption technique due to its popularity and adaptability to field conditions.
sentences.sContent_eng: We will emphasize the membrane absorption technique due to its popularity and adaptability to field conditions.
sentences.sCn: 我们要强调膜吸附技术，是由于它的普及性及对现场条件的适应性。

sentences.sContent: Abstract: : housing demand and housing adaptability, variability is not coordination problem of current our country city housing is very serious.
sentences.sContent_eng: Abstract: : housing demand and housing adaptability, variability is not coordination problem of current our country city housing is very serious.
sentences.sCn: 摘要： 当前我国城市住宅中居住需求与住宅适应性、可变性不相协调的问题十分突出。

words.tran: 适合的；能适应的；可修改的
适配器；改编者；接合器；适应者
适应；改编；改编本，改写本
[通信] 适配器；（美）改编者；转接器（等于adapter）
